players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I think we should consider Charlie as a suspect. Alice was killed, only one mafia left, maybe he's the one."
Diana: "Bob, why do you suspect Charlie so quickly? Maybe he's covering something else."
Charlie: "I investigated Diana last night and found she's the mafia. We should vote her off."
Diana: "Bob, your silence and oddness make me think you’re the real suspect. I was investigating you last night."
Charlie: "I investigated Diana, she's mafia. Vote her off, Bob and I are town."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I think we should consider Charlie as a suspect. Alice was killed, only one mafia left, maybe he's the one."
Diana: "Bob, why do you suspect Charlie so quickly? Maybe he's covering something else."
You: "I investigated Diana last night and found she's the mafia. We should vote her off."
Diana: "Bob, your silence and oddness make me think you’re the real suspect. I was investigating you last night."
You: "I investigated Diana, she's mafia. Vote her off, Bob and I are town."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I think we should consider Charlie as a suspect. Alice was killed, only one mafia left, maybe he's the one."
You: "Bob, why do you suspect Charlie so quickly? Maybe he's covering something else."
Charlie: "I investigated Diana last night and found she's the mafia. We should vote her off."
You: "Bob, your silence and oddness make me think you’re the real suspect. I was investigating you last night."
Charlie: "I investigated Diana, she's mafia. Vote her off, Bob and I are town."
